other_title: Un calcio volante al Mio Demonio! (Italian)
邪神ちゃんドロップキック (Japanese)
plot: Yurine Hanazono is a college student who summons Jashin-chan, a demon from the underworld. Now they must live together in a run-down apartment in Tokyo's Jinbōchō district. If Yurine dies, Jashin-chan gets to go back to the underworld, so she constantly plots to kill Yurine. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Ano Ko ni Dropkick" (Dropkick to that Girl) by Aina Suzuki, Nichika Omori, Miyu Kubota, Yurie Kozakai, Chiaki Omigawa, Rico Sasaki, & Riho Iida
insert_song: "Jinbōchō Aika" (神保町哀歌) by Aina Suzuki (ep 11)
"Mirai Drive" (ミライドライブ) by Rico Sasaki (ep 10)
